title: Celebrity Juice Halloween EXCLUSIVE: Holly Willoughby becomes Harley Quinn AGAIN
text:
As Halloween rolls around again, the Celebrity Juice crew have decked themselves out for another seasonally spooky special.

And in exclusive snaps from the set, this year's episode features a pair of Batman villainesses in the form of team captains Holly Willoughby and Mel B.

Joining host Keith Lemon - who appears as Count Dracula, as played by Gary Oldman in 1992's Bram Stoker's Dracula - Holly dresses up as Harley Quinn, while Mel B is Poison Ivy.

Frightening stuff: As Halloween rolls around again, the Celebrity Juice crew have decked themselves out for another seasonally spooky special

This is the second time Holly has emulated the Suicide Squad character, nodding to the fact that Margot Robbie will return to the role again in 2020's Birds Of Prey.

Holly last dressed as her in 2016, but is back in the costume this year, this time donning a pink top, ripped denim shorts and a sparkling jacket around her shoulders.

She's traded in the baseball bat of 2016 for a carnival mallet this time.

Spooky: In exclusive snaps from the set, this year's episode features a pair of Batman villainesses in the form of team captains Holly Willoughby and Mel B, the latter pictured as Poison Ivy

The line-up: Joining host Keith Lemon - who appears as Count Dracula, as played by Gary Oldman in 1992's Bram Stoker's Dracula - Holly dresses up as Harley Quinn while Will Mellor is Skeletor, He-Man's nemesis, Paddy McGuinness has dressed as Frank N Furter from The Rocky Horror Picture Show and Anna Richardson portrays a spooky Day Of The Dead-style bride

Mel slips into a green ensemble for the episode, teaming this with a red statement wig, painting an elaborate pattern to her eyes.

Paddy McGuinness has dressed in drag for the appearance, squeezing his buff pysique into a black corset, suspenders and stockings, emulating Frank N Furter from The Rocky Horror Picture Show.

Originally portrayed by Tim Curry, Paddy wears a pearl necklace and a black wig, along with lace-up gloves to complete the look.

Cut-throat! Originally portrayed by Tim Curry, Paddy wears a pearl necklace and a black wig, along with lace-up gloves to complete the look. Tan France of Queer Eye has dressed as murderous demon barber Sweeney Todd

2016: Holly channelled Margot Robbie with her Harley Quinn outfit three years ago

Tan France of Queer Eye has dressed as murderous demon barber Sweeney Todd, while Will Mellor is Skeletor, He-Man's nemesis, and Anna Richardson portrays a spooky Day Of The Dead-style bride.

Holly - who is perhaps better known for the girl next door image she conveys alongside co-host Philip Schofield on daytime magazine show This Morning - put on a notable appearance as Harley last time she dressed up as her.

The presenter displayed a rarely seen raunchy side when she sported the heavily applied make-up and girlish dyed pigtails synonymous with the edgy super-villain for 2016's Halloween show.

Going green: Mel emulated Uma Thurman's Poison Ivy from Batman & Robin

Drag race: Paddy put on a great show as Frank N Furter from The Rocky Horror Picture Show

This was much to the liking of compere Keith Lemon who told her: 'You look fit as f**k!'

He added: 'Why don't you dress like that on This Morning? Philip Schofield would have a f**king heart attack!'

Expect more of the the same when the Halloween episode of Celebrity Juice airs next Thursday at 10PM on ITV2.
